oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Modern Photocopier: Its Role as a Key to More Effective Marketing for Today's Bovine Practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cochran, Dwight E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: photocopier
client communication
veterinary practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Communicating with clients has always been a difficult, but critically important part of practice for me. The photocopier has enhanced my ability to communicate ideas and this presentation is designed to share some of the things learned along the way.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1986; 38-39
